author: Morgan Sung
title: The Bon Appétit YouTube stars reveal how they're working from home
description: The Bon Appétit Test Kitchen captured the internet's heart with their culinary YouTube videos. They're still making videos while social distancing — they're just doing it at home. Bon Appétit had "six to eight weeks" of content pre-filmed before New York City…
content:
The Bon Appétit Test Kitchen captured the internet's heart with their culinary YouTube videos. They're still making videos while social distancing they're just doing it at home. 
Bon Appétit had "six to eight weeks" of content pre-filmed before New York City… [+887 chars]
